name: Constructive Criticism
description:
Constructive Criticism was created during the Secret Santa Jam. In it you take the role of two cats fighting to defend their beloved park. When a building is built on top, you must climb it and ultimately tear it down! This is a short platformer with simple graphics and mechanics. I hope you enjoy playing!

Also, to clarify, yes the levels are weird and chaotic for a reason, it fits the construction site theme. Yeah let's go with that.

Code by Kike

Level design by Kike and https://firecoolerqa.itch.io/

Art by https://firecoolerqa.itch.io/

Additional assets by:

Paulina Riva, BlueApple16, Jesus Lastram, Kimberly Geswein, Little Robot Sound Factory, CodeManu.

Dedicated to aku_ryou
